titles.title: A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to address social isolation and loneliness, and for other purposes.
Older Americans Social Isolation and Loneliness Prevention Act
Older Americans Social Isolation and Loneliness Prevention Act
Older Americans Social Isolation and Loneliness Prevention Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions
